name: UIButton.Configuration.Size
desc: A predefined size for button elements.

items.name: case large
items.desc: Displays button elements at a large size.

items.name: case medium
items.desc: Displays button elements at a standard size.

items.name: case mini
items.desc: Displays button elements at the smallest size.

items.name: case small
items.desc: Displays button elements at a small size.

items.name: static func == (UIButton.Configuration.Size, UIButton.Configuration.Size) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two button sizes are equal.

items.name: static func != (UIButton.Configuration.Size, UIButton.Configuration.Size) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two button sizes are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the button size by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the button size.
